title: Basketball and Politics with Enes Kanter
text:
NBA player Enes Kanter joins the podcast to discuss his basketball career and his feud with Turkish President Recep Erdogan.

Kanter talks about his journey to the NBA, playing for the Utah Jazz, New York Knicks, and discusses how players recruit in free agency.

He also talks about his public feud with Turkish President Erdogan and how his criticism has made him public enemy number one. He reveals how his family has been harassed by the Turkish government and how he's been placed into Interpol because of his criticism.
